snippet: Five years after being told to look at taking Social Security numbers off Medicare cards, Medicare officials say they still need six more months to figure out how much it will cost.
abstract: Medicare officials say they will need six additional months to tabulate the costs of taking Social Security numbers off Medicare cards; Government Accountability Office has reported that as many as 48 million people risk having their identity stolen because the numbers remain on the cards.
lead_paragraph: Five years after being told to look at taking Social Security numbers off Medicare cards, Medicare officials say they still need six more months to figure out how much it will cost.

headline.main: Medicare Wants More Time to Study Cost of Security Fix
headline.print_headline: Medicare Wants More Time To Study Cost of Security Fix
